Title: Kent & Stowe 70100446 Turbo Folding Saw K/S70100446
Description:
The Kent & Stowe Turbo Folding Saw is ideal for removing mature wood on larger plants and cutting large branches. It can also be used for cutting turf to size when laying. The precision filed carbon steel blade glides through dead wood with ease and produces a clean and fast cut. Sharp, triple ground teeth allow for efficient cutting of wet and green live wood. It predominantly cuts on the back stroke to minimise effort required.

The blade folds into the rubber, comfort grip handle for easy transport. There is an additional safety catch to open up the saw and to allow for safe storage.

Specification

Cutting Diameter: 10mm
Blade Length: 140mm
Closed Length: 180mm
Guarantee: 5 years
